channel.title: Drop procedure, need help
channel.description:
i can't find a good drop all procedure. The (dropto 2-28) dosn't work. All i need is a symle one but not one that can easily get you banned.
Its for my draynor fisher+Cooker

item.title: Drop procedure, need help
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

I’d use the SRL library, your code can remain the same but the libraries that run it will change for game updates. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop procedure, need help
item.dc:creator: @Infintry001 Infintry001
item.description:
@Infintry001 wrote:

take a look at this code…

Procedure DropAllTHings; var i,e : integer; begin while (I < 6) do begin if not loggedin then break; if (I = 5) and (E < 8) then begin I := 0; E := E + 1; end; if FindColor(x,y,65536,(570 + 39 * I), (214 + 35 * E), (609 + 39 * I), (249 + 35 * E)) then begin Mouse(x, y, 10, 10, False); ChooseOption(x,y,'Drop'); end; if (I = 4) and (E = 7) then break; I := I + 1; end; end;

What this will do is look in every inventory spot for the outline color that every item has (65536). If it finds it, the code will know there is an item in that box and will drop it. You might need to modify it a bit for your needs

Read full topic
